Question: Currently smoked cigarettes or cigars or used smokeless tobacco or electronic vapor products*
Footnote1: *On at least 1 day during the 30 days before the survey.
Footnote3: †Overall, the percentage of students reporting this behavior increased from 2017 to 2019. Any indicated increase or decrease is statistically significant.
Footnote4: [Based on linear trend analyses using logistic regression models controlling for sex, race/ethnicity, and grade (p < 0.05).]
